pcie.c File Reference

This file contains the device abstraction layer APIs for PCIe peripheral. More...

#include <stdint.h>
#include <ti/csl/hw_types.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_pcie.h>
#include <ti/csl/soc.h>

Macros

#define PCIE_32BIT_BAR_SIZE   ((uint32_t)0x04U)
 BAR register offset for 32 bit.
 
#define PCIE_64BIT_BAR_SIZE   ((uint32_t)0x08U)
 BAR register offset for 64 bit.
 
#define PCIE_32BIT_ADDR_ALIGNMENT   ((uint32_t)0x3U)
 Mask for 32-bit address alignment Errata ID (i870): PCIe unaligned read access issue.
